name: FHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on desk lamp”
”Alexa, turn of bedroom light”
”Alexa, set the bedroom light green”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With FHome skill and Alexa, you can control FHome smart devices including Outlets, LED Light Bulb, LED Light Strip, Power Strip using Alexa voice commands.
Please register your FHome smart device using the FHome application, which can be downloaded from Apple Apps Store and Google Play Store. You may set a friendly name for your device in FHome. Eg desk lamp, television, charger.
Please enable FHome skill in Alexa, then sign in to the account that you have registered your FHome device with.
After that you may control your device using Alexa voice commands.

Here’s the guide:
(1). Download our "FHome" app in Google Play or iOS App Store.
(2). Launch the app and register a new account by email with the Verification code(or login if you’re already registered).
(3). Turn on FHome devices and connect them with “FHome” app.
(4). Tips: You can rename your devices with the App. For example, you can rename a smart light to “Living Room Light” in the App.
(5). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app.
(6). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "FHome".
(7). Click Enable skill of "FHome", then input your account username and password on the linking page.
(8). Say to your Echo device: “Alexa, discover devices” and wait for your Echo device to complete the device discovery process.
(9). Setup is now complete. Try using one of the voice commands below to control your smart home devices.
(10.)You can rename the devices by different name within the "Alexa" APP.

If you have any problems, please contact us at ayllo@foneric.com
